mapper.select: select l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time, p.user_id, p.name, p.profile_img, p.email, p.gender, p.enable_status, p.user_type, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time from tb_local_auth as l left join tb_person_info as p on l.user_id = p.user_id where l.username = #{username} and l.password = #{password}

select l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time, p.user_id, p.name, p.profile_img, p.email, p.gender, p.enable_status, p.user_type, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time from tb_local_auth as l left join tb_person_info as p on l.user_id = p.user_id where p.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_local_auth (user_id, username, password, create_time, last_edit_time) values (#{personInfo.userId},#{username},#{password},#{createTime}, #{lastEditTime})
